pr_title: Limit the Number of Snapshots in a BlobStoreRepository

timeline.message:
Limit the Number of Snapshots in a BlobStoreRepository

Adds a limit to the maximum number of snapshots that are allowed
to be added to a snapshot repository as a safety measure of last resort
against repositories that grow to an unmanagable size due to e.g. incorrect SLM
settings.

timeline.body: I think we should name the setting in the message (as done here) but think we shouldn't recommend increasing it if you hit the limit and should instead suggest deleting some snapshots and/or adjusting retention settings to bring the snapshot count below the limit.
